0100101001111100 1011110000110100 0 -> sum: 0000011010110000, cout: 1

0111101110011111 1010011111101100 1 -> sum: 0010001110001100, cout: 1
1100011000001001 1000111110110111 0 -> sum: 0101010111000000, cout: 1
1101101110111010 0111000110000110 0 -> sum: 0100110101000000, cout: 1
1010100001011101 0000010000001101 1 -> sum: 1010110001101011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
